title: Pomodoro break
description: Work 25 min then 5 min break

title: Stretch break
description: Stand up and stretch for 5 minutes

title: Hydration reminder
description: Drink a glass of water

title: Eye exercise
description: Look away from screen for 20 seconds

title: Snack break
description: Eat a light, healthy snack

title: Walk break
description: Walk around for 10 minutes
Practice deep breathing for relaxation

title: Posture check
description: Sit upright, adjust chair and desk

title: Journal note
description: Write down quick notes on progress

title: Meditation break
description: Spend 5 minutes meditating or clearing mind

title: Quick workout
description: Do a set of jumping jacks or push-ups

title: Mindful minute
description: Pause and focus on your breath for 60 seconds

title: Water plants
description: Take a moment to care for your desk plants

title: Inbox check
description: Check and respond to important emails

title: Desk clean-up
description: Tidy up your immediate workspace

title: Motivational quote
description: Read or write a short motivational quote

title: Check calendar
description: Review upcoming meetings or deadlines

title: Gratitude note
description: Write down one thing you're grateful for

title: Silent pause
description: Sit in silence for a couple of minutes

title: Music break
description: Listen to a favorite song or calming music
